mapper.select: SELECT p.userNo as p_userNo, n.message, r.resNo, n.notiDate , p.payment as p_payment, n.notiDate, n.notiStatus FROM tb_notification n LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_payinfo p ON p.payNo = n.payNo LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_reservation r ON r.payNo = n.payNo WHERE p.userNo = #{userNo}

SELECT n.notiNo, n.message, r.resNo, n.notiDate, n.notiDate, n.notiStatus, n.payNo, p.payNo AS p_payNo, p.payment AS p_payment, p.price AS p_price FROM tb_notification n LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_payinfo p ON p.payNo = n.payNo LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_reservation r ON r.payNo = n.payNo WHERE n.notiNo = #{notiNo}
